price: Na Mwenyezi Mungu angeli jua wema wowote kwao ange wasikilizisha, na lau ange wasikilizisha wangeli geuka wakapuuza.
arabic: وَلَوۡ عَلِمَ ٱللَّهُ فِيهِمۡ خَيۡرٗا لَّأَسۡمَعَهُمۡۖ وَلَوۡ أَسۡمَعَهُمۡ لَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ
footnotes: Na Mwenyezi Mungu kwa ilimu yake ya tangu na tangu lau angeli ona ndani yao kuwa, katika hali yao hivi sasa, itakuja patikana kheri yoyote kwao hao kwa nafsi zao, na kwa watu, na kwa Haki, basi angeli wafanya wasikie kusikia kwa kuongoka hata Haki ikaingia akilini mwao. Na hata wangeli isikia na wakaifahamu Haki basi bado wasingeli ifuata. Na mapuuza hayawaachi kwa kuzidiwa na pumbao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw ʿalima al-lahu fīhim khayran la-asmaʿahum walaw asmaʿahum latawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
translations: surely, He (would) have made them hear
surely they would have turned away
